pages.title: the pillar of autumn
pages.text: note: i'll be using the xbox 360 for most of this playthrough. if you see any stuttering, blame me!!

pages.title: start the dang game already!!!
pages.text: congradulizationsons for buying halo for you xbox console! in this game you get to set up your controls really quick then RUN RUN HOLY FUCK THE COVERED NATS ARE COMING!!!!

pages.title: DID THAT GUY JUST DIE????????
pages.text:
uh...
i meant to say that in this game, you walk past an allegiance of aliens bent on killing each and every human. they're called the covenant

this image is not only the most high quality image of any covenant soilders avalible, but also the only picture in existence.

pages.title: okay...
pages.text:
oh hey! it's this guy!!!
he wants us to walk in front of him and get lost

here's an npc, mr car keys. walk up to him, and he'll give you a glock!
he's not that important. kill him if you want

pages.title: glock?
pages.text: the m6d pistol is okay. it lets you shoot people from 10 meters away, can headshot, and is generally good for medium-close to far-medium range combat

pages.title: GLOCK!!!!
pages.text: you also get the ma5b assault rifle around here! it's good at killing things the closer you get to them. i really wouldn't use it any farther than medium range combat, though... it's not that accurate

pages.title: that's not a glock...
pages.text: ok fine... you can zoom in with the pistol. zooming in helps with shooting enemies from farther away! you wouldn't see an ar being effective at this range...

pages.title: yay!
pages.text:
here's what a medpack looks like. medpacks are VERY useful, seeing as they let you regain health (marked by the boxes near the plus)

if you lose your sheilds, your health is exposed. if you lose all your health, you die. your sheilds regenerate automatically, but your health does not. got it?

pages.title: i think so...
pages.text: here's the first red elite in the game... they've got a bit more strategy and sheild health compared to blue elites, but if you can fight well enough, you should be able to beat them

pages.title: okay!
pages.text: there's two things to note from this clip: that one grenade exploding will make surounding grenades explode, and that there's two oversheilds in each covenant boarding craft

pages.title: incredable.
pages.text: here, you're introduced to combat in the dark. not much to really say... use the white button (or lb on the xbox 360 and later) to turn on your weapon's flashlight
and here, you're introduced to the possibility of flanking! so cool

pages.title: so, so cool...
pages.text: you're introduced to fighting enemies above you here. which is cool...

pages.title: mhm...
pages.text: anyone up for a little... flashlight usage? :3

pages.title: no? what the fuck i hate flashlights
pages.text: TOO BAD!!! i love this set piece so much...
the final lifeboat is the one furthest to the west, assuming that the compass in the AR is correct. getting on that lifeboat ends mission one! good job :D
